description: The CodeBoarding subsystem is designed as an agentic documentation pipeline that bridges static analysis with LLM-powered synthesis. It features a dual-entry architecture: a CLI engine for local developer workflows and an asynchronous FastAPI gateway for managing remote documentation jobs. Central to the system is an orchestration layer that sequences repository cloning, agent-based code abstraction, and multi-format report generation. Runtime integrity and cost tracking are managed by a specialized execution monitor that streams telemetry to local storage, while job states are persisted in a lightweight DuckDB backend. The final output is delivered via two specialized generators: one producing static Markdown with Mermaid diagrams for source control integration, and another creating interactive HTML reports with dynamic dependency graphs via a dedicated GitHub Action logic module.

components.name: CLI & Orchestration Engine
components.description: The primary entry point for manual and automated workflows, coordinating repository cloning, agent-driven synthesis, and documentation sequencing. It strictly handles the Markdown generation path for local and direct remote executions.

components.name: Asynchronous API Gateway
components.description: A FastAPI-powered server managing long-running documentation jobs. It handles job queuing, background task delegation, and provides a multi-format output path (HTML, MDX, RST) via integrated GitHub Action logic.

components.name: Job Persistence Layer
components.description: A DuckDB-backed storage layer that maintains the state and lifecycle of documentation jobs, including repository URLs, timestamps, and completion status.

components.name: Execution Monitor
components.description: A runtime telemetry system that captures LLM token consumption, tool usage, and execution timing. It persists metrics to flat JSON files (e.g., `llm_usage.json`) independently of the job database.

components.name: Markdown Documentation Generator
components.description: Transforms synthesized code abstractions into structured Markdown reports with embedded Mermaid.js diagrams for static architectural visualization.

components.name: Interactive HTML Reporter
components.description: Generates dynamic web-based reports featuring interactive Cytoscape.js graphs and cross-linked entity details, primarily utilized by the API and CI/CD workflows.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)

components_relations.relation: Wraps the agentic synthesis process with context managers to capture real-time telemetry.
Manages job lifecycle states and metadata within the persistence layer.
Sequences the transformation of synthesized insights into static Markdown documentation.
Triggers the generation of dynamic web reports via specialized background tasks.
Delegates core repository processing and analysis to the orchestration engine's logic.
